abstract: JPMorgan Chase is considering acquiring a stake in a Chinese brokerage as part of its expansion strategy in the country, its leading executive in Asia told The Financial Times.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is considering acquiring a stake in a Chinese brokerage as part of its expansion strategy in the country, its leading executive in Asia told The Financial Times.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hankers for Chinese Brokerage Deal
